Stop.name: react-native-type-check
Stop.description: Validates TypeScript types in React Native projects before stopping

hooks.command: npx -y @thebushidocollective/han hook run --fail-fast --dirs-with package.json --test-dir "grep -qE '\"react-native\":' package.json" -- npx tsc --noEmit
